meta_description: Discover the Channel Islands Maritime Museum of Ventura County. Explore our dynamic exhibits, exquisite ship models and extensive art collection featuring over 3000 years of maritime history located in Oxnard, CA.
hours_text:
# Come Explore!

OPEN: Thursday- Monday 12 – 4pm 

​

Closed: Tuesday and Wednesday

Closed New Year's Day, Thanksgiving Day, Christmas Day​

Admission:

Adults $10.00

Seniors and Active Military $5.00

College Students (with ID) $5.00

Youth/Children under 18  Free

​​​​​

###### Find Your Way

The Museum is located at 3900 Bluefin Circle, Oxnard, CA

Click "Directions" To find us

Visit : Visit Us

## We Love Our Museum

And so do our visitors...

"My family visited the museum for the first time today. Our visit was exceptional made due to the friendly greeting when we first walked into the museum. Then we were taken through time by the friendly and knowledgeable Klaus H. It was an educational adventure. Thank you! We will visit again."

### Trisha

"We loved this sweet museum with a lovely collection of nautical artwork, both historic and recent, as well as many displays of model ships. We had a great docent who talked to us about some of the highlights and piqued our interest. Would definitely recommend!"

### Lisa H.

"Loved our experience at the Maritime Museum! The staff are friendly and welcoming, they offer to tour you around or let you peruse on your own. When we had a question about the model ships, Mary was very knowledgeable and informative. Downstairs is various paintings and models; upstairs is more informative and hosts art exhibits. I highly recommend this cute spot to know more of the history and appreciate the artwork from the past! (And do ask the staff q...

# WELCOME TO THE CHANNEL ISLANDS MARITIME MUSEUM

*Pending Availability

# Plan Your Visit

## MUSEUM HOURS

Thursday - Monday: 12 - 4 pm &

The first Sunday of every month 8 - 10 am  
Tuesday & Wednesday: Closed

Admission:

Adults $10.00

Seniors and Active Military $5.00

College Students (with ID) $5.00

Youth/Children under 18 Free

Home: Welcome

Home: Opening Hours

## TEMPORARY EXHIBITIONS

Something For Everyone

### Coastal Echoes   
By Lisa Crowder

### Pelicans of Southern California  
By Jonathan Biermann

Home: Exhibitions

Home: Text

## SUPPORT OUR MUSEUM, EXHIBITS, AND PROGRAMS

Did you know?

$50 provides prizes for kids at our events  
$150 covers children's workshop supplies  
$500 allows us to host an exhibition by a local artist  
$1000 helps us offer free admission for all children   
$5,000 enables us to host ten school field trips for our local schoolchildren 

[DONATE HERE TODAY](https://cimmvc.app.neoncrm.com/forms/donate)

## SUPPORTING THE MISSION OF CIMM

The Mission of the Channel Islands Maritime Museum is to preserve and share the wonders of our maritime heritage, highlight our complex interrelationships with the ecology of The Ocean, and showcase people’s creative expressions of everything related to the sea.

​

CIMM is a renowned institution dedicated to preserving and interpreting maritime arts and culture. We offer a wide variety of exhibitions, programs, and educational opportunities for visitors of all ages.
